posts.post_content:
Looking to sell some T206's. I have the following cards. Please add $2 Shipping for any amounts of cards. I also can send a scan of the Back of the Tinker if needed. 

Roger Bresnahan Portrait Piedmont (SGC 50) $165
Hal Chase Dark Cap Sweet Caporal (Good) $25
Joe Tinker Portrait Piedmont (SGC 30) $95
